32 #include <hal_hw_interface/hal_control_loop.h>
33 #include <hal_hw_interface/hal_ros_logging.h>
34 
35 #include <cstdlib> // getenv()
36 
37 // Pre-declare the HAL function
38 extern "C" void funct(void* arg, long period);
39 
40 namespace hal_hw_interface
41 {
42 HalRosControlLoop::HalRosControlLoop() : node_is_shutdown(0)
43 {
44  // ROS node handle
45  nh_.reset(new ros::NodeHandle(""));
46 
47  // Run ROS loop in a separate thread
48  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(2);
49  spinner.start();
50 
51  std::string ros_master_uri = getenv("ROS_MASTER_URI");
52 
53  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME,
54  "%s: Initialized ROS node and spinner; ROS_MASTER_URI = %s",
55  ros_master_uri.c_str(), CNAME);
56 
57  // HW interface
58  hardware_interface_.reset(new hal_hw_interface::HalHWInterface(*nh_));
59 
60  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Initialized HAL hardware interface", CNAME);
61 
62  // ROS callback thread
63  nh_->setCallbackQueue(&non_rt_ros_queue_);
64  non_rt_ros_queue_thread_ = boost::thread(
65  boost::bind(&HalRosControlLoop::serviceNonRtRosQueue, this));
66 
67  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Done initializing ROS callback thread", CNAME);
68 
69  // Controller
70  controller_manager_.reset(new controller_manager::ControllerManager(
71  hardware_interface_.get(), *nh_));
72 
73  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Done initializing ROS controller manager",
74  CNAME);
75 
76  // Init HAL hardware interface
77  hardware_interface_->init(&funct);
78 
79  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Done initializing HAL hardware interface",
80  CNAME);
81 
82  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "HAL control loop ready.");
83 } // constructor
84 
85 // Non-RT thread CB function
86 void HalRosControlLoop::serviceNonRtRosQueue()
87 {
88  static const double timeout = 0.001;
89 
90  while (this->nh_->ok())
91  this->non_rt_ros_queue_.callAvailable(ros::WallDuration(timeout));
92 }
93 
94 void HalRosControlLoop::shutdown()
95 {
96  // Only run once
97  if (node_is_shutdown)
98  {
99  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: shutdown() called again", CNAME);
100  return;
101  }
102  node_is_shutdown = 1;
103 
104  // Shut down ROS node
105  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Shutting down ROS node", CNAME);
106  nh_->shutdown();
107  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Shutting down ROS cb thread", CNAME);
108  non_rt_ros_queue_thread_.join();
109 
110  // Shut down HAL
111  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Shutting down HAL", CNAME);
112  hardware_interface_->shutdown();
113 
114  // Reset shared pointers
115  controller_manager_.reset();
116  hardware_interface_.reset();
117  nh_.reset();
118 
119  HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(CNAME, "%s: Shut down complete", CNAME);
120 }
121 
122 HalRosControlLoop::~HalRosControlLoop()
123 {
124  shutdown();
125 }
126 
127 // This and HAL basically replicate generic_hw_control_loop.cpp
128 void HalRosControlLoop::update(long period)
129 {
130  ros::Duration ros_period(period / 1000000000ull, period % 1000000000ull);
131 
132  hardware_interface_->read(ros_period);
133  // For debugging; spews at startup
134  // if (hardware_interface_->reset_controllers)
135  // // don't use ROS logging in RT context
136  // rtapi_print_msg(RTAPI_MSG_INFO, "%s: Resetting controllers", CNAME);
137  controller_manager_->update(ros::Time::now(), ros_period,
138  hardware_interface_->reset_controllers);
139  hardware_interface_->write(ros_period);
140 }
141 
142 } // namespace
143 
144 // The HAL hardware interface control loop object
145 boost::shared_ptr<hal_hw_interface::HalRosControlLoop> control_loop_;
146 
147 extern "C" {
148 int rtapi_app_main(void)
149 {
150  // Init ROS node
151  // - Pass ROS_MASTER_URI (none causes a sigsegv on ros::init())
152  // - Delegate signal handling to rtapi_app
153  const ros::M_string remappings = {
154  { "__master", getenv("ROS_MASTER_URI") },
155  };
156  ros::init(remappings, CNAME, ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler);
157 
158  // Create HAL controller and hardware interface
159  control_loop_.reset(new hal_hw_interface::HalRosControlLoop());
160 
161  return 0;
162 }
163 
164 void funct(void* arg, long period)
165 {
166  control_loop_->update(period);
167 }
168 
169 void rtapi_app_exit(void)
170 {
171  control_loop_->shutdown();
172  // hw_interface_ smart pointer doesn't need to be deleted
173 }
174 
175 } // extern "C"
